name: spotify-fullstack
description: Spotify clone with Next.js frontend and Django backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && python manage.py runserver"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && python manage.py runserver"
